column5: Start date: January 2024Study healthcare leadership and management as an ever-evolving process that requires self-reflection and continuous development. Learn how to critically evaluate your activities as a leader in order to positively engage with and impact those around you.Why this MSc in Healthcare Leadership?Strong leadership and management is key to the delivery of safe, effective, and compassionate healthcare.A good leader will provide clear goals and direction, motivate their team, and nurture a supportive and innovative organisational structure.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course. £9,800
